nodeList.loreText: Flesh unbound by space and time... for a price.
nodeList.nodeDescription:
Creates a new body for you at the target location, then detonates your old body to deal physical damage to enemies around it.
0 mana, 4 CD, 13% current health.

nodeList.altText: {Bone Armor} grants armor and reduces damage taken.
nodeList.description:
When you use Transplant you are granted {Bone Armor} for 4 seconds, which grants armor and less damage taken (multiplicative with other modifiers).

This effect has a 10 second cooldown.
nodeList.nodeDescription:
On arrival you are encased in bone armour for 4 seconds. Bone armour grants [100] armour and [4%] less damage taken per point.

This effect has a 10 second cooldown.

node.loreText: Flesh unbound by space and time... for a price.

Creates a new body for you at the target location, then detonates your old body to deal physical damage to enemies around it.
0 mana, 4 CD, 13% current health.

nodeList.altText:
{Bone Armor} grants armor and reduces damage taken. Lasts 4 seconds. 10 second cooldown.

This node increases the stats that bone armour grants.
nodeList.description: {Bone Armor} is more effective.
nodeList.nodeDescription: Bone Armor is [10%] more effective per point.

nodeList.altText: {Bone Minions} are additional Melee Skeletal Minions that are spawned when you Transplant.
nodeList.description: {Bone Minions} last until killed, but you may have only 1 active at a time.
nodeList.nodeDescription: Bone Minions last until killed. You may only have 1 at a time.

node.description: You leave behind a {Bone Minion}, which is a temporary melee minion, when you use Transplant, but your previous body no longer detonates. Other detonations still behave normally.
node.nodeDescription: Your previous body no longer explodes, but stays as a Bone Minion that lasts for 20 seconds. Other explosions still behave normally.

nodeList.altText: Your Rip Blood tree does affect Rip Blood cast by your Transplant skill.
nodeList.description: You automatically cast {Rip Blood} at enemies nearby where you depart, but Transplant costs more health. An enemy cannot be hit by multiple instances of Rip Blood created this way.
nodeList.nodeDescription:
[10%] increased health cost per point.

node.description:
Transplant explosions instantly kill enemies that are below a health threshold (a percentage of their maximum health). 

If you have a similar effect from an item or passive node, then the highest threshold is used.
node.nodeDescription: You can Transplant to an enemy below [5%] health per point, killing it instantly.

nodeList.description: Transplant's base physical damage is converted to necrotic damage. Consequently this damage scales with increases to necrotic damage, but not increases to physical damage.
nodeList.nodeDescription: Converts all of Transplant's base damage from physical to necrotic damage.

node.nodeDescription: [20%] increased area of effect per point.

nodeList.nodeDescription: Inflicts Fear upon enemies nearby your departure point.
